item.title: Fyre Festival Founder Billy McFarland Just Sold the Tarnished Brand on eBay for $245,300
item.description: What was once billed as the greatest luxury music festival of all time has just been sold on the same site that people use to buy used home decor.

item.title: 3 Innovations That Can Dramatically Reduce AI Energy Costs
item.description: New research demonstrates methods for reducing AI energy consumption by up to 90 percent.

item.title: Why the SBA Just Opened Its Disaster Loan Program to Churches and Faith-Based Organizations
item.description: The SBA’s new center will help faith-based companies and places of worship navigate government contracts and access to capital.

item.title: I Interviewed With an AI for a Job, and Flunked Miserably
item.description: Job candidates are encountering AI voice bots more frequently as companies struggle to keep up with surging numbers of applicants.

item.title: Surge AI Left an Internal AI Safety Doc Public. Here’s What Chatbots Can and Can’t Say
item.description: Inc. obtained the document from Surge AI, a data-labeling giant. It contains dicey edge cases on sensitive topics.
